marklogic.body: Mr. Braman as you might agree that the word HERO is tossed around too lightly, so I must say to you the words General Patton once uttered " YOU MAGNIFICENT SOB" ! Loria wouldn't make a pimple on your backside when it comes to character and humanity. For an Art Collecter Loria doesn't make a pretty picture Good Luck Mr. Braman on finding honest. worthwhile politicians, it's not a Mission for the Faint of heart, but you just might be able to pull it Off!
